first_para: Thomas James Greatrex (born 30 September 1974) is a British Labour Co-operative politician, who has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for Rutherglen and Hamilton West since 2010 and the Shadow Energy Minister since 2011.

full.extract: Thomas James Greatrex (born 30 September 1974) is a British Labour Co-operative politician, who has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for Rutherglen and Hamilton West since 2010 and the Shadow Energy Minister since 2011.
full.title: Tom Greatrex
